data.eml:eml: A new species of Oxelytrum Gistel (Coleoptera, Silphidae) from southern Argentina, with a key to the species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliva, Adriana (2012): A new species of Oxelytrum Gistel (Coleoptera, Silphidae) from southern Argentina, with a key to the species of the genus. ZooKeys 203: 1-14, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.203.2837, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.203.2837
